Title: Winning Formula
Writer: Claudia Pickering, Anna Bennett (based on a screenplay by), Claudia Pickering (based on a screenplay by)
Actors: Claudia Pickering, Prudence Vindin, Peter J. Walters, Don Woods
Plot: While backpacking around America, two Aussie girls find themselves deep in turtle racing debt. They devise crafty schemes to earn money any way they can while unwittingly becoming tangled in a dark mystery surrounding their family's past.
